    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ContactType
    Enum to define the two different contact types for contactData() method in the FindInText class
    CVRanking
    Class to rank a CV against the job description
    CVRecord
    Record to store data parsed from CVs
    CVScore
    Record used to return values in the CVsNLP method
    CVsNLP
    Class that uses Natural Language Processing models to parse CVs
    FileChooser
    Class to launch a GUI for choosing a file
    FileReaderUtility
    Class for reading files
    FindInText
    Class used to find specific things in a String
    GetProperties
    Class for getting properties from properties file
    Hashing
    Class that deals with password hashing
    JobDescription
    Job description class
    JobDescriptionNLP
    Natural language processing class for the job description
    JobDescriptionRecord
    Record to store data parsed from job description
    JobDescriptionUploadAction
    User action class that implements UserAction
    KeyboardReader
    A helper class to enable input of data from the keyboard ensuring exceptions are handled here.
    Login
    Login class handles the UI for the user to login
    LoginAuth
    Class containing the logic for a user to login
    Main
     
    Menu
    Menu class, The main class in this program for the user, allows access to all the program functions
    NLP
    A utility class for the NLP classes
    RecordRepository
     
    Register
    Register class
    RegisterAuth
    Class containing the logic for registering a new user
    ShowJobDescriptionAction
    User action class that implements UserAction interface
    UploadCV
    Class to upload CVs
    UploadCVAction
    Action class that implements UserAction
    User
    Class to handle the User Contains functions: login(), register(), logout(), isLoggedIn(), getUsername()
    UserAction<T>
    Interface to define the user action classes
    UserLoginAction
    Class that implements the UserAction interface
    UserLogoutAction
    Class that implements UserAction interface
    UserRegisterAction
    Class that implements the UserAction interface
    ViewRankedCVs
    Class to view the CVs in a ranked order
    ViewRankedCVsAction
    Class that implements UserAction interface
